title: Veettukkoru Saamiyundu Lyrics Jeyikkira Kuthira
stanzas: <div>Veettukkoru Saamiyundu Lyrics Jeyikkira Kuthira Songs Lyrics

Veettuku oru saamiyundu
adhu amma amma daa.
naama kovil kulam
povathellaam ada
summa summaa da.(3)

ava ezhutha padikkala
aanaa enna padichchava.
enna idupil thookkithaan
andha nilava pudichava.

Veettuku oru saamiyundu
adhu amma amma daa.
naama kovil kulam
povathellaam ada
summa summaa da

Mutta mutta paal koduthu
thatti thatti thoonga vachi
anachchiye
vaari anachchiye

kotta kotta mazhaiyilathaan
chotta chotta naan nenanjaa
sabichiye mazhaiya
sabichiye

siru maangaa kadichi
masakka poakki
maavu velakku
manasil yaethi.
Kaanaa kovil
viradham irundhiye

maru jenmam edukkayil
un paadham sumakkanum
naan thaayaa porandhu
madi thaangi valarkkanum

Veettuku oru saamiyundu
adhu amma amma daa.
naama kovil kulam
povathellaam ada
summa summaa da

Noi nodiyil padukkaliye
novu vandhu irakkalaiye
adukkumaa
ayyoo adukkumaa

kambu ooni nadakkalaiye
kannu paarva koraiyalaiye
saabamaa
idhu paavamaa

nee noolaa elachi
nondhu vendhu
aduppu oodhi
irumi kedandhu
enna nenachi
azhudhu sevandhiye

nee kalavu poniyaa
vinnail ulavu poniyaa
nee elavu aaniyaa
enna izhandhu poniyaa

Veettuku oru saamiyundu
adhu amma amma daa.
naama kovil kulam
povathellaam ada
summa summaa da

ava ezhutha padikkala
aanaa enna padichchava.
enna idupil thookkithaan
andha nilava pudichava.

Veettuku oru saamiyundu
adhu amma amma daa.
naama kovil kulam
povathellaam ada
summa summaa da
